bug.author: xmgpev
bug.summary: manual_control.py exits after 2s without an error
bug.description: Hello, I compiled CARLA 0.9.9.4 and PythonAPI (on Win10). Everything worked fine, the compilation completed without errors. I opened the CarlaUE4.uproject and clicked the play button. When I run the manual_control.py script, the pygame window only shows up for 2 seconds and after that it closes with no errors. I debugged it and found that client.get_world() gave me an error message: [WinError 10054] An existing connection was forcibly closed by the remote host. I have tried other (also the compiled) versions and the result is the same. I hope someone can help me. Thanks in advance!

comments.comment: Sorry for the delay. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/jackbart94>@jackbart94</denchmark-link> could you provide some feedback about this issue?
I finally found the bug in my case. I had several versions of Carla on my laptop and the system path variable CARLA_ROOT was configured for an older version of the PythonAPI.
